trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event that is raised by visual design tools, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje metodę, która będzie obsługiwać <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> zdarzenie, które jest wywoływane przez narzędzia visual projektowania, takich jak [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], wdrożenia <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView"> </xref> interfejsu.
Ta klasa nie może być dziedziczona.

trans-unit.source: When you create a ViewEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Podczas tworzenia delegata ViewEventHandler, należy określić metodę, która obsłuży zdarzenie.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Aby skojarzyć zdarzenie z obsługi zdarzenia, należy dodać wystąpienia delegata zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Program obsługi zdarzeń jest wywoływana, gdy wystąpi zdarzenie, o ile nie usuniesz delegata.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat delegatów obsługi zdarzeń, zobacz [NIB: zdarzenia i delegatów](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>Zdarzenie jest wywoływane przez projektanta hosta dla pewne akcje w formancie na powierzchni projektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is handled by a ViewEventHandler delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>Zdarzenie jest obsługiwane przez metody obiektu delegowanego ViewEventHandler, która przyjmuje <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>obiektu jako parametr.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: Typically, control designer classes do not directly implement or assign a ViewEventHandler delegate.
trans-unit.target: Zazwyczaj klasy projektanta formantów bezpośrednio implementacji lub przypisać delegata ViewEventHandler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base class supplies a default delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.

Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Projektanci kontrolki niestandardowej zastępują <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, i <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>metody przetwarzania tych zdarzeń formantu na powierzchni projektu.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method sets the default event delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate.
